Hailar district, Mongolian Xailar raion, of Hulunbuir city 呼倫貝爾市|呼伦贝尔市[Hu1 lun2 bei4 er3 shi4], Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: There is a railway station in Hailar and the trains travel pass the grassland.
sentences.chinese: 海拉爾市有火車站，所以草原上會有火車經過。

sentences.english: Hailar Basin is a meso-cenozoic of multicycle, composite-style, fault-sag basin.
sentences.chinese: 海拉爾盆地是一箇中新生代多旋迴複雜疊合盆地。

sentences.english: In Hailar City the focus has been placed on rectifying the problem of low work efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 在海拉爾市，重點抓了辦事效率低的整頓問題。
